nodes.text: An officer of the underworld police visited a cantina on Level 1997 of the planet Coruscant several days after the destruction of the planet Alderaan. Traveling with a stormtrooper, the officer encountered the fugitives Anandra Milon and Santigo Milon in the cantina, but the pair fled after seeing the Imperials. The stormtrooper gave chase and eventually caught up with Anandra on Level 1996, but the officer did not pursue the pair. The officer carried a blaster pistol and wore standard underworld police uniform.

The officer first appeared, but wasn't named, in "One Thousand Levels Down" a short story written by Alexander Freed and illustrated by Joe Corroney and Brian Miller. The story was published in 2014 in Star Wars Insider 151.
